page.title: 08STEVEN'S MORNING AT BARR
page.content: 07.30-Got up,had breakfast,washed and brushed hair and teeth.Put my jacket on and went over my spelling whilst waiting for the school car. 08.15-Got into the car and drove down to the main road to wait for the school bus.My big sister got on the bus going to Girvan Academy.The car picks up Pauline,at the water-works then on the way to the village we stop for the three girls at Lanes Farm. Arrive at school at 08.45. 09.00-School starts.Spelling is first then my group does maths and a speed game. 10.30-Playtime and milk.I played on the climbing frame. 10.45-Playtime over.I did some of my English work-book and then wrote down tonight's spelling words.12.15 Dinner.
